discourse_list.title: Erroneous transfer to DAI contract address HELP!

content.content: Hi I erroneously sent an USDT transfer to the DAI contract address 0x6b175474e89094c44da98b954eedeac495271d0f. It was a large sum around 9k, I can see the transaction was processed and is showing up on the balance viewable on etherscan. https://etherscan.io/tx/0xf09029781c5f47170b1b9019583cd25d40612f81797e31d8c90ff6144acb6173 Is there anyway to have the USDT returned or tokens burned and reminted? Just looking for some help or someone to point me in the right direction. Thanks -Cory

Cory_Drury:  Is there anyway to have the USDT returned or tokens burned and reminted? Just looking for some help or someone to point me in the right direction. Thanks   Contact the USDT team, on their website they have a support email for these cases, I know a friend who sent USDT to a contract address directly, and he contacted USDT, presented proof that it was his wallet and they refunded him the USDT in a couple of days.
Don’t worry, that’s why we are in the community to support each other, please tell us how it went.
